name: Researchskills
tagline: A graduate course on the crafts of science
body:
### General infos This site contains material and links for the MSc module Research Skills. The objective of this course is to to learn discipline-independent skills for doing quantitative research at the graduate-level. Taught at the University of Regensburg and the University of Freiburg. **Author:** [Florian Hartig, University of Regensburg](http://www.uni-regensburg.de/biologie-vorklinische-medizin/theoretische-oekologie/mitarbeiter/hartig/index.html) ### Course content *Introduction to philosophy and history of science, scientific method, finding your question, design of experiments, ensuring reproducibility, data analysis in R, visualization, introduction to LaTeX, scientific writing, logic and clarity, scientific presentations, good scientific practice* ### Course materials and further readings #### Lecture notes * **Main lecture notes** - [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/1otretqxn2o34e3/ResearchSkills.pdf?dl=0) * **Statistics** lecture notes [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/s38ge7pjgf55qs1/EssentialStatistics.pdf?dl=0) * **LaTex** lecture notes [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9kjanprrj0vjhdf/how_to_latex.pdf?dl=0) * **Slides** of the lectures, as well as further readings and exercises will be posted on the respective course information sites #### Labs / Practicals All labs available [here](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs) * **Literature Research** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/LiteratureResearch) / [practical](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/raw/master/Labs/LiteratureResearch/Practical/Practical_LiteratureResearch.pdf) * **Project Organization** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/ProjectOrganization) / [project template](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/raw/master/Labs/ProjectOrganization/ExampleProject.zip) * **LaTeX** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/LaTeX/) * **Statistics with R** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/Statistics) * **Version Control** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/VersionControl) * **Scientific Writing** - [lab material](https://github.com/florianhartig/ResearchSkills/tree/master/Labs/ScientificWriting) ### Past courses * Winter term 15/16 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) * Winter term 14/15 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) * Winter term 13/14 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) * Winter term 12/13 (1-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Renewable Energy Management) * Winter term 12/13 (3-week full time, Uni Freiburg, MSc Env/For) ### Authors and copyright Unless specified otherwise, the author of these materials is Florian Hartig.
